mapper.select: SELECT bm.board_id, ud.profile_img, um.username AS writer, bm.board_content, GROUP_CONCAT(bf.file_name) AS file_name, bm.update_date FROM board_mst bm LEFT OUTER JOIN board_file bf ON(bf.board_id = bm.board_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(um.id = bm.writer) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_dtl ud ON(ud.id = bm.writer) GROUP BY bm.board_id ORDER BY bm.update_date DESC, bf.file_id ASC;

SELECT bm.board_id, ud.profile_img, um.username AS writer, bm.board_content, GROUP_CONCAT(bf.file_name) AS file_name, bm.update_date FROM board_mst bm LEFT OUTER JOIN board_file bf ON(bf.board_id = bm.board_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(um.id = bm.writer) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_dtl ud ON(ud.id = bm.writer) WHERE bm.keyword = #{keyword} GROUP BY bm.board_id ORDER BY bm.update_date DESC, bf.file_id ASC;
